ygData.subject: Re: Demon Claw
ygData.msgSnippet: Tell me about it, I managed to trade for a second one just incase the fixed it with this patch....no such luck, for now a good friend is using it, but I do
ygData.messageBody:
Tell me about it, I managed to trade for a second one just incase the fixed
it with this patch....no such luck, for now a good friend is using it, but I
do look forward to the day I look like Wolverine :)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mifsud, Michael [mailto:Michael.Mifsud@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 8:36 PM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Demon Claw
>
>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> hmm so it IS a bug. I really hope they fix that one soon. I thought they
> didn't allow you to wear two because there such a good weapon (its average
> is 0.3 or very close to this number).
>
> > ----------
> > From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 12:06 AM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Demon Claw
> >
> > From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
> >
> > yah, can only use in primary weapon slot, can't use 2 :(
> >
> > >>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.25.99 12:05:37 AM >>>
> > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> >
> > What is the bug, that you can only wear one?
> >
> > > ----------
> > > From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 12:04 AM
> > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Demon Claw
> > >
> > > From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
> > >
> > > per a conversation with a guide (who was supposidly talking to a gm),
> > > there is a known bug with the weapon, and that one day soon
> it might be
> > > fixed, and that I might not like the fix. No idea what they ment by
> > that.
> > > And yes, currently you can only weild 1....*wishes he could weild 2,
> > > because in his full set of blackend, he'd look kick ass with 2 claws*
> > >
> > > Salr D'Taynkk
> > > Dark Warrior of The Kith
> > > Veeshan
> > >
> > > >>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.23.99 8:36:58 PM >>>
> > > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> > >
> > > And I can only have one correct? even warriors?
> > >
> > > > ----------
> > > > From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> > > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > > Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 11:42 PM
> > > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Demon Claw
> > > >
> > > > From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
> > > >
> > > > no, its simply a 1h slashing weapon
> > > >
> > > > Salr D'Taynkk
> > > > Dark Warrior of The Kith
> > > > Veeshan
> > > >
> > > > >>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.18.99 7:56:28 PM >>>
> > > > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> > > >
> > > > Are these monk weapons like the griffin claws?
> > > >
> > > > > ----------
> > > > > From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> > > > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > > > Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 11:34 PM
> > > > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > > > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Demon Claw
> > > > >
> > > > > From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > Equipped it looks like a 3 foot claw sticking out of my hand.
> > > > >
> > > > > Salr
> > > > >
> > > > > >>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.17.99
> 8:30:14 PM >>>
> > > > > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > What does it look like??
> > > > >
> > > > > > ----------
> > > > > > From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> > > > > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > > > > Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 12:08 AM
> > > > > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > > > > Subject: [warriors_eq] Demon Claw
> > > > > >
> > > > > > From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Damn I feel cool now, scored me a Demon Claw this weekend. What
> > is
> > > a
> > > > > > Demon Claw, well its a really nice, really cool
> looking, magic 1h
> > > > > slashing
> > > > > > weapon that the Avitar of Fear carries. The AoF is high, real
> > high,
> > > > > 30s,
> > > > > > 38 or so, but his claw kicks butt. Damage is only 5,
> but speed is
> > > 19,
> > > > > yes
> > > > > > 19, I swing it about 6 or 8 times in the time it takes
> me to swing
> > > my
> > > > > BBC
> > > > > > just twice. In some fights I swear the thing swings almost
> > > > > continusouly.
> > > > > > Needless to say, this weapon has restored my faith in dual
> > wielding.
> > > > > >
> > > > > >
> > > > > >
